about_the_game:
In the middle of a wasteland, three robots have re-activated from slumber. You must lead these robots on a journey through a desolate world, on a quest to find life.

The robots are fully customizable, with a set of Job Classes, and learnable abilities, that one can cycle through, in order to adapt and progress.

Abilities from different Classes can be mixed together to build powerful robots, it may prove to be a necessity. In addition, one must also make use of powerful equipment.

In Way of Robot, each robot will be able to bring up to 4 different weapons into combat, these weapons will have a wide variety of attacks and effects.

By conquering special towers, it is possible to acquire items of higher rarities, which have special attributes. 

You will encounter many opponents on your way, robots driven mad over time, or sinister organizations that seek to divert or destroy you. You will battle these foes, till one side becomes scrap.

Combat is turn based, you have several actions that can be taken per turn, use them well. Build your party well, some combinations will go far, others not so much..

The world you explore is different on every playthrough, locations and dungeons are shuffled, new events pop up on the world map, new opportunities and dangers await.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2105
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 Graphics / Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3225
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 Graphics / Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Way of Robot is a Turn-Based RPG. Join three robot companions on a journey to find life in a destroyed world. 14 Job Classes, 100 abilities. The map changes with every playthrough, new treasures, events, and enemies await, fully customize your party to survive.
